Initially Larry and Sergey Brin were pretty young when Google Inc. started, so maybe they weren't prepared at that point to run the day-to-day operations of Google Inc. .`` But at this point they've been involved for several years now, and are in a better position to really run the company as opposed to just being in the founder role.
